00065 class OSIMCOMMON_API VisibleObject: public Object
00066 {
00067 
00068 //=============================================================================
00069 // DATA
00070 //=============================================================================
00071 public:
00072 private:
00073     // PROPERTIES
00075     PropertyStrArray    _propGeometryFileNames;
00076     Array<std::string>& _geometryFileNames; 
00077 
00078     Array<Geometry*>   _allGeometry;
00080     PropertyObj     _propVisibleProp;
00081     VisibleProperties&  _visibleProp;
00082 
00084     PropertyDblVec3 _propScaleFactors;
00085     SimTK::Vec3&        _scaleFactors;
00086 
00087     // In general these can use the Observable mechanism but that would be slow 
00088     // for display purposes.
00089     ArrayPtrs<VisibleObject>    _dependents;
00090 
00091 protected:
00092     Object*             _owner; // Actual object that owns this VisibleObject
00093     Transform           _transform; // transform relative to _owner's frame. unserialized
00094 //=============================================================================
00095 // METHODS
00096 //=============================================================================
00097     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098     // CONSTRUCTION
00099     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 public:
00101     VisibleObject();
00102     VisibleObject(const std::string &aFileName);
00103     VisibleObject(const VisibleObject &aVisibleObject);
00104     virtual ~VisibleObject();
00105     virtual Object* copy() const;
00106     virtual void setup(AbstractDynamicsEngine *aEngine) { }

00109     void setNull();

00116     VisibleObject& operator=(const VisibleObject &aObject);

00119     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00120     // GET AND SET
00121     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00122 public:
00123     // OWNER OBJECT
00124     void setOwner(Object *aObject)
00125     {
00126         _owner = aObject;
00127     }
00128 
00129     Object* getOwner()
00130     {
00131         return _owner;
00132     }
00133     // GEOMETRY FILES
00134     void setNumGeometryFiles(int n);
00135     void setGeometryFileName(int i, const std::string &aGeometryFileName);
00136     const int getNumGeometryFiles() const;
00137     const std::string& getGeometryFileName(int i) const;

00144 
00145     void setScaleFactors(const SimTK::Vec3& aScaleFactors);
00146     void getScaleFactors(SimTK::Vec3& aScaleFactors) const;
00147     // A variation that uses raw arrays for use from GUI only.
00148     void setScaleFactors(const double aScaleFactors[]){
00149         setScaleFactors(SimTK::Vec3::getAs(aScaleFactors));
00150     }
00151     void getScaleFactors(double aScaleFactors[]) const {
00152         getScaleFactors(SimTK::Vec3::updAs(aScaleFactors));
00153     }
00154     // More interfaces for transform as other interfaces (Angles based) are needed
00155     void rotateRadians(const double rR[3]);
00156     void rotateRadians(const double rR[3], const Transform::RotationOrder order);
00157     void rotateRadiansX(const double rR);
00158     void rotateRadiansY(const double rR);
00159     void rotateRadiansZ(const double rR);
00160     void rotateRadiansAxis(const double rR, const SimTK::Vec3& axis);
00161     void rotateDegrees(const double rR[3]);
00162     void rotateDegrees(const double rR[3], const Transform::RotationOrder order);
00163     void rotateDegreesX(const double rR);
00164     void rotateDegreesY(const double rR);
00165     void rotateDegreesZ(const double rR);
00166     void rotateDegreesAxis(const double rR, const SimTK::Vec3& axis);
00167     void translate(const SimTK::Vec3& t);
00168     // DEPENDENTS
00169     void addDependent(VisibleObject *aChild){ _dependents.append(aChild); };
00170     bool hasDependent(VisibleObject *aChild){ // Check if dependency already added
00171         for(int i=0; i < _dependents.getSize(); i++){
00172             if (_dependents.get(i)==aChild)
00173                 return true; 
00174         }
00175         return false;
00176     };
00177     void removeDependent(VisibleObject *aChild){ _dependents.remove(aChild); };
00178     int countDependents(){ return _dependents.getSize(); };
00179     VisibleObject *getDependent(int i) { 
00180         return _dependents.get(i); 
00181     };
00182     // GEOMETRY ITEMS
00183     void addGeometry(Geometry* aGeometry)
00184     {
00185         _allGeometry.append(aGeometry);
00186     };
00187     void removeGeometry(Geometry* aGeometry)
00188     {
00189         _allGeometry.remove(_allGeometry.findIndex(aGeometry));
00190     };
00191     // Release resources allocated by the display support code.
00192     void freeGeometry()
00193     {
00194         for (int i=_allGeometry.getSize()-1; i >= 0; i--)
00195             delete _allGeometry.get(i);
00196         _allGeometry.setSize(0);
00197     }
00198     Geometry* getGeometry(int i)
00199     {
00200         return _allGeometry.get(i);
00201     }
00202     int countGeometry()
00203     {
00204         return _allGeometry.getSize();
00205     };
00206     const Geometry* getDefaultGeometry()
00207     {
00208         return AnalyticSphere::createSphere(0.1);
00209     }
00210 
00211     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00212     // XML
00213     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00214     void setupProperties();
00215 
00216     // updateGeometry is the method used to update geometry that can change (e.g. muscles
00217     // changing geometry during motion).
00218     // Clients/subclasses should not override this method unless their geometry is changing.
00219     // This call forces the "recomputation" of geometry aside from display implications.
00220 protected:
00221     virtual void updateGeometry() {};

00224 };  // END of class VisibleObject
